original_text: And Absalom rose up early, and stood beside the way of the gate: and it was so, that when any man that had a controversy came to the king for judgment, then Absalom called unto him, and said, Of what city art thou? And he said, Thy servant is of one of the tribes of Israel.
korean_text: 압살롬이 일찍이 일어나 성문 길 곁에 서서 어떤 사람이든지 송사가 있어 왕에게 재판을 청하러 올 때에 그 사람을 불러 이르되 너는 어느 성읍 사람이냐 하니 그 사람의 대답이 종은 이스라엘 아무 지파에 속하였나이다 하면

sentences.original_text: and stood beside the way of the gate
that when any man that had a controversy came to the king
and said, Of what city art thou?
Thy servant is of one of the tribes of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 종은 이스라엘 지파 중 하나입니다
